frontend.branches.kurd_genius_qaiwan: Kurd Genius Educational Communities Qaiwan Heights
frontend.hero.title: Kurd Genius Schools
frontend.mission.title: Mission Statement
frontend.mission.description: At Kurd Genius School, our mission is to create a safe, inclusive, and inspiring learning environment where every student is empowered to reach their full potential.
frontend.mission.description_full: We strive to develop lifelong learners who are academically prepared, socially responsible, and globally minded. Through high quality education, modern teaching methods, and strong moral values, we prepare our students to become leaders, critical thinkers, and compassionate citizens.
frontend.history.title: History and Achievements
frontend.history.description: Kurd Genius School was established in 2013 by Maya Company, a proud member of the Qaiwan Group of Companies, and is led by Mrs. Sozan Abubakr Mawlud.
frontend.principal_message.title: Principal's Message
frontend.news.title: News
frontend.news.description: Stay updated with the latest news and events from Kurd Genius School. Learn about our achievements, activities, and important announcements.

frontend.campus.description: Explore our modern campus facilities designed to provide the best learning environment for our students.

frontend.campus_details.title: Campus View
frontend.campus_details.paragraph1: The school campus hums like a living city, its heart beating with the footsteps of dreamers. Sunlight spills over red-brick halls and stretches across the green lawns where students gather. Library windows glow at dusk, holding centuries of knowledge in their quiet embrace. Cafés buzz with ideas, laughter, and the scent of freshly brewed coffee. Paths wind between buildings like threads weaving stories into the fabric of the place. Here, ambition meets opportunity, and the future takes its first bold breath.
frontend.campus_details.paragraph2: Banners ripple in the breeze, carrying the colors and pride of generations past. The echo of a distant bell calls minds to focus and hearts to hurry. Shadows of tall trees sway over benches where friendships are carved in time. Classrooms hold the quiet thrill of discovery, the spark before the answer comes. Athletic fields stretch wide, alive with cheers and the pounding rhythm of running feet. Art spills from studios—paint-stained hands shaping beauty from nothing. In quiet corners, solitary figures write futures in notebooks worn by use. The night air carries whispers of debates still lingering in the open air. Dorm windows flicker with the warm light of stories shared too late into the night. And as dawn rises, the campus awakens again, ready to shape another day of dreams.
frontend.campus_details.paragraph3: In quiet corners, solitary figures write futures in notebooks worn by use. The night air carries whispers of debates still lingering in the open air. Dorm windows flicker with the warm light of stories shared too late into the night. And as dawn rises, the campus awakens again, ready to shape another day of dreams.

frontend.academic.choose_description: We offer a holistic, student-centered educational experience that blends academic learning with personal development.
frontend.academic.approach_description: We offer a holistic, student-centered educational experience that blends academic learning with personal development.
frontend.calendar.academic_description: Kurd Genius School follows a structured academic calendar with a balance between academic rigor and creativity. Highlights include:
frontend.calendar.official_description: We observe national and regional holidays as declared by the Ministry of Education, including:
frontend.admission.title: Admission
frontend.admission.policy_description: We welcome all students from Kindergarten to Grade 12. Admission is based on academic readiness, personal interviews, and the school's capacity.
frontend.admission.tuition_description: Our tuition fees are announced annually by the accounting department, including installment schedules and promotions.
